title: Source
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The source element is used to specify multiple media resources for media elements.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Adding a source to a video element
usageExamples.code:
<video controls>
  <source src="movie.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  <source src="movie.ogg" type="video/ogg">
  Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/video @controls=""
	/source @src="movie.mp4" @type="video/mp4"
	/source @src="movie.ogg" @type="video/ogg"
  Your browser does not support the video tag.

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Adding a source to an audio element
usageExamples.code:
<audio controls>
  <source src="music.mp3" type="audio/mp3">
  <source src="music.ogg" type="audio/ogg">
  Your browser does not support the audio element.
</audio>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/audio @controls=""
	/source @src="music.mp3" @type="audio/mp3"
	/source @src="music.ogg" @type="audio/ogg"
  Your browser does not support the audio element.
